snippet.title: Hubris VR - Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
Hubris, is a Sci-Fi VR action-adventure game.    Follow us at: http://www.hubrisvr.com/   Wishlist:   https://store.steampowered.com/app/1265800/Hubris   https://discord.gg/VxJSzYzEkB
Hubris is set for release in 2022 on all VR platforms: PC VR, PlayStation VR and Quest.

A recruit of the OOO is sent to the Twin Planet System to search for the mysterious agent Cyanha. With the help of the pilot Lucia, the player will have to shoot, swim, climb and jump to survive the harsh environment and wildlife on a planet which is being terraformed, while fighting wicked enemies of the OOO.

Hubris © 2021 Cyborn All Rights Reserved
